note.p: Birth: Singleton Grange, Singleton-in-the-Fylde, Lancashire, England
Education: School at Manchester; Brasenose College, Oxford; BA (1683); Jesus College, Cambridge; MD (Com. Reg. 1690)
Career: Practised in London and later in Manchester
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Hunter; Foster
Notes: Proposed by William Musgrave. Never in lists. DNB gives date of death as 1701?, but mentions him as alive in 1705 and says his widow died before 1717; Venn gives date of death as 1717
